ValidationRule.description: Once a Claim is flagged as Approved, the Goodwill fields cannot change. This validation rule only applies to Commercial and Residential Claims.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ClaimApproved__c, OR( ISCHANGED(GoodwillClaim__c ), ISCHANGED(GoodwillClaimAmount__c ) ), OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercial_Claim', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Residential_Claim' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Goodwill Flag / Amount cannot be changed once the Case is marked as approved
